data:
Introduction to the Accessibility Requirements Tool (ART)

This video provides a demonstration of how you can use the Accessibility Requirements Tool (ART). ART allows you to generate a list of Section 508 requirements that apply to the Information and Communication Technology (ICT) that you wish to procure. This video explains when you should use ART, how to create and edit your list of requirements using ART, and how to use the requirements list that ART generates.

Duration 7m 19s | 1-Part Video Tutorial
